channel.title: Dro-pkz v1 first release dontflame please
channel.description:
pelase dont flame, this is my first source, i used v0id pkz v2 i think, i will give credits at the end. i am gonna make a v2 using a diffrent source. i am not giving % credits to resolve flaming. here some pics ;D
all commands. reg player i think ("::barrows, ::pk, ::pktools, ::drowars, ::skillz, ::starter, ::thieve, ::pkbox", ("::switch, ::edge, ::cather, ::icemini, ::train, ::shops, ::teampk, ::drags", ("::dungeon, ::deathpk, ::octagon, jad, ::home, ::dropk, ::fish, ::smith", ("::afk, ::back, ::wc, ::runesnfood, ::anti, ::mystats, ::kq, ::farm", mod pkarm, ::tb, ::barrage, ::modwear, ::toy, ::rich", skiller, ::kick (name), ::banuser (name), ::st4ff, ::master, ::pure
Admin Command and owner ::xteletome (user), ::xteleto (name)::adminwear, ::ipban (name), ::xrichie", 8160);"::pnpc (npcID), ::pickup (ItemID) (Amount), ::npc (npcID), ::checkip (name)", ::Xteleall::ownerwear, ::ownerpkwear, ::emote (emoteID), ::alert
new home lost pic but i can give a description banks surrounding fountain, blocked off home with oblisk,and there are ancient altars
new shops, fally coded by me. new shops, blocked off..
newpkbox by me [URL=http://img255.imageshack.us/my.php?image=dropkzpkboxhq0.png][IMG]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/8134/dropkzpkboxhq0.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img255/dropkzpkboxhq0.png/1/][IMG]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/dropkzpkboxhq0.png/1/w800.png[/img][/URL]
creds who ever made v0id-pkz source me a mopar mod, forget name (i will found out wich mod it was and modify)
uppit dl link: http://uppit.com/N6FJ3P uppit dl link: http://uppit.com/N6FJ3P
if ur gonna leech give me some cred. if youdownload please comment and say that u dled.
thanks ;D
sorry for the pics, i wil make sure they work in v2 thanks
